input.description:
This XML document is the event received from the Change management application indicating that a change request has been approved.
Sample: <alert-message alert-id="000000000016578"> <server-name>itsm-vm1</server-name> <form-name>CHG:Infrastructure Change</form-name> <object-id>CRQ000000001864</object-id> <source>AR</source> <timestamp>1228371286</timestamp> <priority>0</priority> <text>Audit Change ID: CRQ000000002021 Status: Scheduled Configuration Name: BLADELOGIC Templates:/aFolder/aComponentTemplate RunIndex:2005211 JobType:31</text> </alert-message>

output.description:
String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: 1 success, -1 failure

String Value - Verbose status message
Example: The process completed successfully for CRQ000000000162

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet:
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="//batch-job-error-list/error or //deploy-job-error-list/error"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">
Errors while creation of remediation job:
</xsl:text> <xsl:for-each select="//batch-job-error-list/error"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('- ', text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> <xsl:for-each select="//deploy-job-error-list/error"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('- ', text())" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> </xsl:text> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <status-messages> <xsl:copy-of select="//status-messages/*" /> <xsl:if test="'${itsm success status}'='failure'"> <status-message>${status message}</status-message> </xsl:if> </status-messages> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="//text()='true' and '${itsm success status}'='success'"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">success</xsl:text> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">failure</xsl:text> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow is triggered by RBA monitor adapter upon receiving a notification for Change ticket status change. This workflow checks the status of the change ticket for approval. If the change ticket is approved, the workflow creates and executes/schedules delta package job(s) for the targets that are found to be inconsistent.
